title: Ceph: 20 Years of Cutting-Edge Storage at the Edge
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: Ceph started as a 40,000-line C++ implementation of the Ceph File System, and it has since evolved into a comprehensive storage solution used by organizations worldwide.
cntitle: Ceph：20年尖端的边缘存储技术
cndescription: Ceph 最初是一个包含 40,000 行 C++ 代码的 Ceph 文件系统实现，现已发展成为全球组织使用的综合存储解决方案。
